greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Difference between 2^n and the largest factorial <= 2^n.
maple: A048764 := proc(n) local a; for a from 1 do if a! > n then RETURN((a-1)!); fi ; od: end: A135996 := proc(n) 2^n-A048764(2^n) ; end: seq(A135996(n),n=0..60) ; # _R. J. Mathar_, Mar 16 2008
results.author: _Ctibor O. Zizka_, Mar 03 2008, Mar 16 2008
ext: More terms from _R. J. Mathar_, Mar 16 2008
